original_title: Hidden Wall-Mount Table Looks Like Hanging Art
original_content:
If you live in a compact space, sometimes you have to get creative with your furniture to make the most of it. This wall-hanging table design from [diyhuntress] is perfect for those situations where you need a table, but you dont want it taking up the whole room when its not in use. Plus, its kinda stealthy, which makes it even more fun!
The table is a folding design, with a flat wooden top, and an equally-sized supporting leg that goes down to the ground. The other end of the table is supported by a frame on the wall, which also contains several shelves for small objects. The trick is that the table top and support are hinged together, so that they can fold up and sit in front of the shelves, essentially hanging the whole assembly from the wall. Even better, by painting a simple artwork on the support, the whole thing just looks like a decor piece with no clue as to its hidden functionality.
Its a fun build, and one that you could easily knock out in a weekend with some basic woodworking skills. Weve featured some other nifty shelf designs before, too. Just remember, too  a neat and tidy space is a boost to your hacker productivity, so dont rule this out for your own use!
title: コンパクトな空間でも有効活用できる、壁掛け式テーブルの作り方
body: コンパクトな空間では、家具を工夫して最大限に活用する必要があります。この壁掛けテーブルは、使わないときには部屋を占拠しないため、最適です。ウッドトップと地面に行く等しいサイズの支持脚を持つ折りたたみデザインです。テーブルのもう一方の端は、小物用の棚がある壁のフレームで支えられています。テーブルトップとサポートがヒンジ付きでつながっているため、折りたたんで壁から吊り下げることができます。また、サポートにシンプルなアートワークを描くことで、隠された機能性が分からない装飾品の様にも見えます。基本的な木工スキルを持っていれば、週末に簡単に作れます。整理整頓されたスペースはハッカーの生産性を高めるため、自分自身にも最適です。
